name: Dot Gobbler
description:
Dot Gobbler is a High Definition re-imagining of the Mr. Computer Products classic. Featuring state-of-the-art graphics, audio and animation, now you can find out exactly what happened on that fateful Halloween night.

Download the soundtrack here!

Credits:

Art, Animation, Game Design, Sound Effects: David Thatcher (Giraffe Cat).

Music: James Starkey (5 of 6).

Vocals: Chris Remo.
